name: Treasures of the Pharaoh
description:
Tour a virtual museum exhibit and come face-to-face with artifacts from a pharaoh's tomb. Learn all about the mythology, funerary customs, and daily life of the ancient Egyptians. It's just like going to an actual museum, except without all the looted artifacts obtained through colonialism!

Use the WASD keys to move, the E key to pick things up, and the Q key to put things away.
